children.text: Building a knowledge graph involves several key steps. Entity extraction identifies important concepts, objects, or individuals mentioned in the text. Relationship extraction determines how these entities are connected. Entity resolution ensures different mentions of the same entity are properly linked. Knowledge integration combines the extracted information with existing knowledge bases.

Various techniques are used in knowledge extraction. Rule-based approaches define patterns to recognize entities and relationships. Machine learning methods use statistical models trained on labeled data. Deep learning approaches like BERT and GPT provide advanced natural language understanding capabilities.
Common challenges include handling ambiguity, scaling to large datasets, and maintaining consistency. In particular, overfitting in machine learning models can lead to poor generalization.

segments.text: Key concepts in AI include artificial intelligence, machine learning, and neural networks. These form a hierarchy where neural networks are a type of machine learning technique, which is itself a branch of artificial intelligence.
